name: Inkly
description:
Welcome to Inkly, a 2D platformer set in an art world were you need to rescue your friendly sprites from paintings they were trapped in. Collect all four art fragments to unlock the next level! You’ll need the help of the sprites scattered around to progress through the level, keep a lookout for teleporters. 

Hit any key to continue from title screen.

Controls

E - Enter teleporters and enter levels

F - Zoomed out view

A/S - Horizontal Movement

Space - Jump

ESC - Return to menu level

Screenshots Credits

Programming - Liam K.

All Art and Assets - Liam D.
